column4: hello everybody, i have to solve a problem with a missing codec, someone knows of that?
mediabuntu
what you mean with mediabuntu?
what codec is it?
see http://www.medibuntu.org/
i would install the mediabuntu repos
see http://medibuntu.org/repository.php
i already did it but theres no package with that name
install libavcodec-extra-53
i'll try with that
again the same problem
let  me look
i think that the problem is not with the codec, i have this problem since the release update
no its a linking problem or a version number
what can i do?
looking
did you install the package ultrastar-ng  ?
no its name is ultrastardx but i dont install a package
how did you install it?
i don't know i follow the instruction in a web
i dont know i would try Performous
i'll try to reinstall it and then maybe try with that program
its not the same program ultrastar has not updated in over a year
you can try and talk to the makers on http://webchat.quakenet.org/?channels=ultrastardx&uio=d4
